summary: The Leveraging Educational Opportunity Networks Act aims to provide grants to eligible entities to establish workforce training programs. These programs focus on career and technical education, offering pre-training support, stipends, and supportive services. The bill prioritizes programs for underserved populations and those in high-demand industries such as construction, IT, and healthcare. Grantees must report on participant earnings and employment outcomes. The bill authorizes $30 million annually from 2026-2029 for this purpose.
